meanings.sent1: We need to preestablish the rules before starting the game.
meanings.sent2: It is important to preestablish a plan before executing any project.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to preestablish a secret code for fun.
meanings.sent4: She preestablished her reputation as a reliable worker.
meanings.sent5: The teacher preestablished the classroom routines for a smooth year.

meanings.definition: To set up or arrange in advance
meanings.sent1: Let's preestablish the meeting time to avoid any confusion.
meanings.sent2: The company likes to preestablish the schedule for the week on Mondays.
meanings.sent3: The friends preestablished a meeting spot for their weekly gatherings.
meanings.sent4: He preestablished the decorations for the party to surprise everyone.
meanings.sent5: The team preestablished the route for the race to ensure fairness.
